description: A JSON Representation of a Europass Document corresponding to Europass XML 3.0

SkillsPassport.description: Defines a sequence of elements that fully describe a Europass XML document.

enum: Identification Headline WorkExperience Education Skills Achievement ReferenceTo
Identification Headline Education WorkExperience Skills Achievement ReferenceTo

Identification.title: Personal Information
Identification.description: Contains the personal information of the individual, which includes at least the name, and contact information, demographics and photo.

PersonName.description: Describes the name of a person. Consists of a first-name and surname.

ContactInfo.description: Contains all the available methods of contacting individual.

Address.description: Defines the residence address of an individual.

Country.description: Defines a country. The country is described by a code and a label. E.g. code: FR, label: France.

Code.description: Defines the country code type. The type is defined in the included schema 'EuropassISOCountries'.

Email.description: Defines the email address of an individual.

Telephone.description: Lists the telephone numbers owned by the individual.

Website.description: Lists the websites that are owned, built by or refer to the individual.

InstantMessaging.description: Lists the instant messaging accounts numbers owned by the individual.

Demographics.description: Contains demographics-related information about the individual. It includes the birthdate, gender and list of nationalities.

Birthdate.description: The date of birth of the individual. According to its type, the Birthdate element has no content and must have at least a year attribute.

Nationality.description: Defines a nationality. The nationality is described by a code and is a text only element. E.g. code: DE, label: German.

Photo.description: Contains the base-64 encoded bytes of a JPEG or PNG image file that represents the personal photo of an individual

Headline.title: desired employment/ occupation field
Headline.description: Contains a headline label for the current document. It is optional and may accommodate various cases.

WorkExperience.title: list of work experiences
WorkExperience.description: Contains an list of work experiences. The order of those experiences is defined by the related printing preferences.

Position.description: The occupational field is described by a code and a label. E.g. code: 41150, label: Secretary.

Education.title: list of education experiences
Education.description: Contains an list of learning achievements or a training periods (formal or not). The order of those experiences is defined by the related printing preferences.

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.description: Contains a sequence of skills and competences that the learner has acquired during any formal or informal experience.

Code.description: The mother language code is defined in the included schema 'EuropassISOLanguages'.

ForeignLanguage.description: Describes the level of knowledge of the language and related linguistic diplomas and/or experiences.

Code.description: The foreign language code is defined in the included schema 'EuropassISOLanguages'.

Experience.description: Describes a list of linguistic experiences

Certificate.description: Describes a list of linguistic certificates

Communication.description: Defines a generic skill, which is modelled with one unstructured (free text) Description element.

Organisational.description: Defines a generic skill, which is modelled with one unstructured (free text) Description element.

JobRelated.description: Defines a generic skill, which is modelled with one unstructured (free text) Description element.

Computer.description: Defines a generic skill, which is modelled with one unstructured (free text) Description element.

Driving.description: Defines a skill, the description of which is a driving category.

Other.description: Defines a generic skill, which is modelled with one unstructured (free text) Description element.

Achievements.title: Achievements
Achievements.description: Contains a list of additional information about the various achievements of an individual, such as participation to conferences, workshops, memberships to organisations, list of publications, etc.
